## Suggested README Layout

Add this section to your main README.md after the title:

```markdown
# ScaleFlow - SaaS Shift Scheduling & Management Platform

<div align="center">

![ScaleFlow Logo](https://img.shields.io/badge/ScaleFlow-Shift%20Management-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=calendar&logoColor=white)

## Build Status

[![CI Pipeline](https://github.com/Rafaelraas/ScaleFlow/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Rafaelraas/ScaleFlow/actions/workflows/ci.yml)
[![Deploy to GitHub Pages](https://github.com/Rafaelraas/ScaleFlow/actions/workflows/pages.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Rafaelraas/ScaleFlow/actions/workflows/pages.yml)
[![CodeQL](https://github.com/Rafaelraas/ScaleFlow/actions/workflows/codeql.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Rafaelraas/ScaleFlow/actions/workflows/codeql.yml)

## Tech Stack

[![TypeScript](https://img.shields.io/badge/TypeScript-5.5-blue?style=flat-square&logo=typescript)](https://www.typescriptlang.org/)
[![React](https://img.shields.io/badge/React-18.3-61DAFB?style=flat-square&logo=react)](https://reactjs.org/)
...existing badges...

</div>
```

## Branch-Specific Badges

To show status for a specific branch (e.g., main):

```markdown
[![CI Pipeline](https://github.com/Rafaelraas/ScaleFlow/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg?branch=main)](https://github.com/Rafaelraas/ScaleFlow/actions/workflows/ci.yml)
```
